name: Leardon Solutions
tag_list: product-development, commercialization, engineering, design, manufacturing, outsourcing, consumer-products, medical-products, sports-products
overview:
Leardon Solutions is a multinational company that helps entrepreneurs, startups, and small companies turn their ideas and concepts into physical products by providing product development, design, prototyping and manufacturing solutions.

Leardon Solutions recognizes the need companies have for fast, cost effective, and reliable product development. We work for small and medium companies, entrepreneurs, startups, and inventors to help bring their ideas to market. Our efficient processes developed and used in the largest Fortune 500 companies are optimized for the needs of our customers.

Our global team is currently working on multiple design and manufacturing programs for companies in the United States, United Kingdom, and Ireland spanning the medical devices and diagnostic, health and lifestyle, commercial, consumer electronics, and active sports industries.
